full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 535 Filed 12/09/21 Page 8 of 8
numbers, is in fact accurate. A limiting instruction to that effect is appropriate. If requested by the Defense, the Court would also instruct the jury that they may not consider any of the handwritten markings, since those were not authenticated.
III. CONCLUSION
For the foregoing reasons, the Court overrules the Defense's objections to GX 52. The parties are ORDERED to confer and propose a limiting instruction consistent with this ruling on or before today, December 9, 2021, at 7:00 p.m. The parties are FURTHER ORDERED to confer and prepare a stipulation that Government Exhibits 52A, 52D, 52E, 52F, 52G, and 52H are true and correct photocopies of five pages from GX 52. See Trial Tr. at 858.
SO ORDERED.
Dated: December 9, 2021 New York, New York
ALISON J. NATHAN United States District Judge
